attributes.action: Publicise the names and addresses of petition signatories to prevent corruption.
attributes.additional_details:
By showing the names and addresses of those who sign the petition the public can help identify any suspicious looking activity and report it.

To match how voting works, people should be allowed to opt out of showing their details publicly if a match is found on the voters register.

The following petition has a suspiciously high volume of signatories:
http://tinyurl.com/ntnoo2k

Tower Hamlets mayor Lutfur Rahman was sacked and later found guilty of corrupt practices:
http://tinyurl.com/o4abcc8
attributes.background: There is a lack of accountability for those signing petitions. Some petitions have a large volume of signatures which are added at a suspiciously fast rate. The problem is made worse with how easy it is to spam the petitions with automatic signings, and semi-automatic signings.
